title: Reason for change in energy consumption from 1850

content.prompt: Which of the following best explains the change in energy consumption in the time period from 1850 to 2000 C.E.?

choices.label: Medical innovations that extended human life expectancy
Breakthroughs in agricultural production as a result of the Green Revolution
New methods of communication, such as radio and the Internet
New technologies that enhanced production through the use of petroleum and nuclear power

topic.text: 9.1: Advances in Technology and Exchange after 1900
